alert.note: Alert for Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 07 at 7:55PM MST until February 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Northern Foot Hills. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a slight decrease in the winds around sunrise.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
